tagline: Builds fast, reliable test suites that catch bugs before they ship — and never cry wolf
pros: Framework architecture that scales — page objects, fixtures, factories built for growth
CI/CD integration expertise with parallel execution and sharding for fast feedback
Obsessive about flaky test elimination — the suite stays trustworthy

cons: Focused on automation — manual exploratory testing isn't her primary mode
Needs application access and test environments to be effective
Test infrastructure setup has upfront cost before it pays dividends
